metadata.synopsis: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony, after Ketheric has transformed into his Apostle form/reached his second stage, Nightsong will react to this upon her first combat turn after this.
metadata.how_to_trigger: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony. It will play on Nightsong.- Load SCL_Main_A- Using ReCon command "oe KethericShowdown_Start"  to teleport yourself there.- Use "oe KethericShowdown_Transform". This will initiate stage 2 and transform Ketheric into the Apostle of Myrkul.- Once Nightsong gets her first turn in combat (and she is available to speak), this AD will play on her.

0.speaker: Nightsong
0.text: Now you wear a face to match your soul, oathbreaker.
0.context: NodeContext: Scorn in the heat of battle - her nemesis has just turned into a hideous monster
